programmes.show_description: Deep blue horror. A crew of an underwater nuclear base fight for their lives when an alien menace at the bottom of the ocean is disturbed. (1988)
Action adventure with Dolph Lundgren. A mother has one night to fulfil a set of horrific demands set by a notorious mob boss if she wants to see her son alive again. (2019)
Take a look at all the latest movies and series coming your way this month!
Legend returns soon.
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home... Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
Sci-fi action. It's a deadly race against time to prevent a global disaster after a meteor crashes into the moon and puts it on a collision course with Earth. (2020)
Take a look at all the latest movies and series coming your way this month!
Murdock is mistaken for a killer and the team pretend to be mercenaries to protect a teenage squatter from an unscrupulous landowner. S4, Ep17
The soldiers of fortune find themselves in trouble after arriving in a small town while searching for a missing precious-metals expert. S4, Ep18
An old buddy turns up at Face's high school reunion and requests the team's help in hunting down a sunken Spanish galleon full of treasure. S4, Ep19
The team is enlisted to outmanoeuvre a couple of land swindlers plotting to evict a group of enterprising senior citizens. S4, Ep20
A mobster, avenging his brother who was accidentally killed in the ring, stalks an alcoholic ex-boxer. Hulk Hogan guest stars. S4, Ep21
Western with Rock Hudson. The friendship between two cowboys is shattered by their love for the same woman, leading to conflict on opposite sides of the law. (1973)
Frontiersman Nathaniel Hawkeye and his Indian brothers help a British officer escort two women through dangerous territory in the 1757 French and Indian War. (1977)
Adventure comedy with John Wayne. An American soldier settles on a South Sea island after WWII, but the arrival of his friend's daughter throws his easy-going life into turmoil. (1963)
A '60s hack-writer's work is given a new lease of life when he collaborates with William Shakespeare. Guest starring Burt Reynolds. S4, Ep18
Fact-based drama with Ethan Hawke. A plane carrying a college rugby team crashes in the Andes, and as supplies dwindle, the survivors are faced with the horrifying prospect of eating the dead. (1993)
Action thriller with Charlie Sheen. A skydiving instructor helps a beautiful Russian spy foil an international criminal conspiracy to steal a fortune in bullion. (1994)
Fast-paced action with Dave Bautista. When Texas declares war to secede from the US and their neighbourhood is invaded, a young woman and a war veteran must depend on each other to survive. (2017)
Action with David Carradine. As the Vietnam War comes to an end, one man embarks on a life-threatening mission to free a group of American prisoners held in a secret Vietcong camp. (1986)
Legend returns soon.
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
Chuck Norris is Walker in this modern, high-kicking martial arts western. Walker helps a wrestler whose ex-wife is in hiding after witnessing a murder. S5, Ep16
A mobster, avenging his brother who was accidentally killed in the ring, stalks an alcoholic ex-boxer. Hulk Hogan guest stars. S4, Ep21
Vincent finally obtains tangible proof of the alien invasion when he captures a flying saucer after fighting off a group of Invader guards.
The Asylum meets Arthur Conan Doyle! Holmes and Watson are on the trail of a criminal and scientific mastermind who seems to control monsters and creations that are beyond belief. (2010)
Take a look at all the latest movies and series coming your way this month!
Sci-fi adventure with Lionel Jeffries. An eccentric Victorian inventor builds the world's first spaceship for an expedition to the moon, where giant insects roam. (1964)
Fantasy adventure sequel. An explorer encounters dinosaurs as he leads an expedition to a mysterious prehistoric island to rescue his friend from a forgotten civilisation. (1977)
Take a look at all the latest movies and series coming your way this month!
The Enterprise crew encounter a mysterious space traveller with a hidden agenda while investigating how the Earth managed to escape a global disaster in 1968. S2, Ep26/26
When a hotel owner believes he is being watched by aliens and commits suicide, the Invaders take over the hotel - giving them access to a special guest.
When a criminal gang infiltrates a small town and begins intimidating several gas station owners, the A-Team are called in to help. S4, Ep22
Chuck Norris fights crime and helps the community as the eponymous Walker. Walker investigates further after Trivette apparently shot a child during the apprehension of some suspects. S5, Ep17
Fact-based thriller with Jason Statham. During a heist, a London bank robber accidentally steals top-secret files that the government and security services are determined to keep buried. (2007)
Crime thriller with Robert De Niro. After a disastrous attempt to rob a casino belonging to a powerful crime boss, two criminals are forced to hijack a bus as they try to make a getaway. (2015)
